tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Always superb , many times visited and the most favorable things was no waiting time and friendly behavior. Thank you
Very pleasant experience with Dr harsh, explained teeth problem and proprcedure of next treatment for cure and also told how much it cost?

What I would like to highlight misc is the soft and humble nature that both doctors have. Dr Jigna made a crown for me *** * **** *** **** *** *** **** * ********* ***. 
She made sure that I had absolutely no pain or discomfort during the entire procedure. 

Before starting, she told me the different types of crowns available, their merits and demerits and many other aspects which helped me make an informed decision. 
I cannot recollect the last time I met a dentist who took so much time in explaining and making me feel comfortable. I am never ever changing my dentist .
reply_text: THANKS FOR THE VALUABLE FEEDBACK.

review:
At first I was quite confused where to get my root canal treated and get my zirconia cap fixed.. because there are a lot of dental clinics in mumbai.. some charge less with really unpleasant clinic where you'd not want to get yourself treated as oral hygiene is very important.. and those with good clinics costs you a fortune.. then finally I got this clinic of Dr. Jigna Shangavi which is really huge, pleasant and hygienic and well equipped with the latest machines.
You should definitely try it out because you'll get the most cost effective treatments here and worth for every single penny.
I am a person who is always afraid of surgeries but here to my surprise I didn't even feel anything while getting it done.. as both the docs are really friendly they make you feel so comfortable and at ease.
SO I would strongly suggest try it out if you looking for the most cost effective *** **** ********* *** *********

Do let us know if we can help with your concerns in the future.
